alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 25 at 10:02AM CDT until October 25 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Texas, including the following county, Val Verde. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 959 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding could be ongoing over some locations. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Val Verde County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
